long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Glibzter Immersive is a web browser extension that 𝗮𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘃𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗱𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗵𝗿𝗮𝘀𝗲𝘀 from the content you consume on the internet in the form of:

📰 Reading 𝗢𝗻𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 𝗡𝗲𝘄𝘀 𝗔𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲𝘀 on international news portals like BBC, CNN, and MSN News, as well as Indian news portals such as The Times of India and Scroll.in. 

▶️ Streaming 𝗩𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗼𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 𝘀𝘂𝗯𝘁𝗶𝘁𝗹𝗲𝘀/ 𝗰𝗹𝗼𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗮𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 on YouTube and Netflix.

The extension opens up a web app for contextual practice and assessments.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗱𝗼 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗯𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁?

👉 You focus on the video or news article, while the extension does the hard work of curating the words and phrases from it.

👉 Gain confidence in communicating in English by practicing contextual usage as well as word combinations

👉 Quantify your word power


𝗕𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:

🔢 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗘𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿: The total number of words and phrases estimated in the video or online article categorized as Basic, Essential and Uncategorized. 

Only the ones marked under 'Essential' and 'Uncategorized' are presented for AI-powered contextual practice on the web app.

✍ 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝗻𝘁𝗿𝘆: Enter English words and phrases you come across offline or while accessing any online resource other than what Glibzter Immersive is engineered to work on.

↘️ 𝗕𝘆 𝗦𝗼𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗲: Know how many words and phrases are acquired from videos and online articles

𝗪𝗲𝗯 𝗔𝗽𝗽 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:

📊 𝗗𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱: Gives an overview of words and phrases acquired, practiced and already known by period and source.

🧐 𝗣𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗲: Usage examples by situation and emotion, as well as word combinations (collocations). For practicing in smaller numbers, access the 'Daily Practice' segments on the Home screen.

💬 𝗧𝗲𝘀𝘁: Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) and Speech/ Writing based assessments testing your contextual usage skills.

The test opens up only if a minimum 10 words and phrases are practiced.
